import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const Products = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false); // getProducts useEffect(() => { const getProducts = async () => { try { const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:3001/products/page/${page}`); const data = await response.json(); if (data.status == true) setProducts(data.data); return null; } catch (error) { console.log('Get products error: ', error.message); } } getProducts(); }, [page]); const nextPage = () => { setPage(page + 1); }; const prevPage = () => { setPage(page - 1); }; return ( < div className="container-fluid" >
{/* */}
